QuestData.Title: To Westguard Keep!
QuestData.Description: <Vice Admiral Keller rolls up the battle plans.>$B$BWe've got all the information we need to keep Valgarde protected. You must take these battle plans to Westguard Keep, located on the western fjord cliff wall. Speak with the flight master assistant, Emilune Winterwind. She will put you on the back of a gryphon headed towards Westguard.$B$BOnce there, find Captain Adams. He's the one in charge. Adams will know what to do with these plans.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Dragonflayer Battle Plans to Captain Adams at Westguard Keep in the Howling Fjord.
QuestData.CompletionText: Valgarde has not fallen? That's a surprise.$B$BMust be due to your help. It sure wasn't because of Keller.
QuestData.RewardText: <Captain Adams takes the plans from you.>$B$BI'm glad you decided to come over. My advisors and I will need some time to study these plans. In the meantime, we can use all the help we can get!
